original_text: And Manasseh slept with his fathers and was buried in the garden of his house, in the garden of Uzza, and Amon his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 므낫세가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 궁궐 동산 곧 웃사의 동산에 장사되고 그의 아들 아몬이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Manasseh slept with his fathers
and was buried in the garden of his house
and Amon his son reigned in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아몬이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라
